channel.title: Triangle – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies
channel.description: Better nannying for North Carolina starts here!

image.title: Triangle – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies

item.title: (triangle) Playdate Outing: Eastgate Park
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: NC PAN shares a post from a Friend for North Carolina nannies about a gathering at Eastgate Park, Raleigh on April 18, 2024, from 10 to 11:30 am. Hosted by Select Sitters, there will be coffee, snacks, and juice. Nannies should RSVP via email or social media for adequate planning of refreshments.
item.content:encoded:
Signal Boost

The following post was sent to us by a Friend of NC PAN to share with all the nannies of North Carolina. Your North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies does not know any more about this content than what we are posting here, nor are we connected with the activities mentioned. Contact information for the responsible party is included. Please contact them.

If you would like your event, outing, opportunity, or occasion signal boosted, please reach out! signalboost@ncpan.org

Date
April 18, 2024

Location
Eastgate Park
4200 Quail Hollow Dr
Raleigh, NC 27609

Time
10-11:30 am

Come hang out with the Select Sitters team at Eastgate Park in Raleigh on Thursday, April 18th!

Bring your charges to play, have some refreshments, provided by Select Sitters, and socialize a bit! They’ll provide coffee, snacks, and juice boxes.

Let them know if you’ll be able to make it so that they can plan appropriate refreshments. RSVP by email, Facebook, or Instagram.

item.title: [triangle] FREE CPR Skills Refresher
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: In Durham, on Wednesday, August 17th, there will be a free skills refresher for CPR. It does not include certification.
item.content:encoded:
In Durham, on Wednesday, August 17th at 10 am, there will be a free skills refresher for CPR. It does not include certification.

This is a great opportunity to refresh your own CPR skills or to send to employers who may not be interested in becoming fully certified but want some hands on practice. Attendees will need to wear face masks as a disease prevention protocol.

Includes Infant CPR.

more details on facebook

item.title: Triangle Nanny Nights Out Group
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: There is a new Facebook group for public nanny nights out in the Triangle area of NC. It is ONLY for nanny nights out. So if you want to invite people to your nanny night out or want to find a nanny night out, join the group and add the resource to your toolkit. As […]
item.content:encoded:
There is a new Facebook group for public nanny nights out in the Triangle area of NC. It is ONLY for nanny nights out. So if you want to invite people to your nanny night out or want to find a nanny night out, join the group and add the resource to your toolkit. As explained by the group founder:

… I thought it would be a good idea to have a list of all the PUBLIC NC Triangle Nannies’ Night Out events. This group is ONLY for public events … have fun and socialize with others in the NC nanny community.

Genia S
Visit the group on facebook

Events from that group will be appearing in the unified North Carolina Nanny Calendar that is maintained by the North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies. You can find it on the bottom of any page on the NC PAN website, as the first menu entry under the “Events” heading in the menu, at calendar.ncpan.org, or can have it added to your phone or Google Calendar for ease of use.

If your events have not been featured on the North Carolina Nanny Calendar and you would like them to be, send an email to social@ncpan.org to have them added. We love to help you spread the word!

item.title: (triangle) Nannies Night Out for July TWO
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Date and Time: July 12th at 7 pm Location: Kabuki NC @ 220 Nottingham Dr, Cary, North Carolina 27511 Join us at Kabuki NC (similar to Kanki) on Friday, July 12th at 7pm for dinner, games, giveaways, and FREE DESSERT! Please RSVP by Monday, July 8th so we can make reservations. NO ‘MAYBE’ RSVP’s PLEASE!!! As usual, everyone […]
item.content:encoded:
Date and Time: July 12th at 7 pm

Location: Kabuki NC @ 220 Nottingham Dr, Cary, North Carolina 27511

Join us at Kabuki NC (similar to Kanki) on Friday, July 12th at 7pm for dinner, games, giveaways, and FREE DESSERT! Please RSVP by Monday, July 8th so we can make reservations. 

NO ‘MAYBE’ RSVP’s PLEASE!!! 

As usual, everyone will need to arrive by 7:10 to be seated together, sorry for any inconvenience! 

Register and RSVP on Facebook, or by messaging Triangle Nanny Tribe administrator Sammi.

item.title: (triangle) Nannies Night Out for July — Mary Poppins Returns
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Date and Time: July 11th at 7 pm Location: Raleigh Rose Garden @ 301 Pogue Street, Raleigh, North Carolina 27607 Meet up with your local nannies and watch Mary Poppins Returns at the Raleigh Rose Garden on Thursday, July 11th at 8:30pm. Food trucks will be out at 7pm so come early and hang out! Autumn has offered […]
item.content:encoded:
Date and Time: July 11th at 7 pm

Location: Raleigh Rose Garden @ 301 Pogue Street, Raleigh, North Carolina 27607

Meet up with your local nannies and watch Mary Poppins Returns at the Raleigh Rose Garden on Thursday, July 11th at 8:30pm. Food trucks will be out at 7pm so come early and hang out! Autumn has offered to arrive early to get us a good spot and put up a balloon so it’s easy to find us! She’s also offered to bring popcorn and candy to share with the group. Picnics ARE allowed so feel free to bring your own food! DON’T FORGET A BLANKET OR CHAIR! Feel free to bring your significant others! THIS EVENT IS FREE, no ticket necessary. 

All movies will be held in the Stephenson Amphitheatre next to the Raleigh Rose Garden.
Concessions (including cold adult beverages provided by Raleigh Brewing) will be available for purchase. Food trucks will be at each show. Please, no outside alcohol, as this is a city park, but feel free to bring cushions/blankets/chairs. Looking for parking tips? Download the Hillsborough Street App!

Register and RSVP on Facebook, or by messaging volunteer hostess Autumn.

item.title: (triangle) Nannies Night Out and Potluck for June
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Date and Time: June 21st at 7:15 pm Location: Camden Crest Apartments @ 5200 Summit Manor Ln, Raleigh, North Carolina 27613 Join us on Friday, June 21st at 7pm for a movie and pot luck! Please RSVP by Monday, June 17th. There will be a post for everyone to comment what they will bring so we […]
item.content:encoded:
Date and Time: June 21st at 7:15 pm

Location: Camden Crest Apartments @ 5200 Summit Manor Ln, Raleigh, North Carolina 27613

Join us on Friday, June 21st at 7pm for a movie and pot luck! Please RSVP by Monday, June 17th. There will be a post for everyone to comment what they will bring so we don’t get duplicates. I will send info on how to get up to the theater the week of the event.
NO ‘MAYBE’ RSVP’s PLEASE!!! 

Please arrive by 7:15 or let me know in advance if you will be later for me to let you in, sorry for any inconvenience!

Register and RSVP on Facebook, or by emailing Triangle Nanny Tribe Administrator Sammi.

item.title: A Portfolio Workshop of Sorts (triangle)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Date and Time: June 15th at 11 am Location: Private Home in Durham; address sent to those registered If you want to work on your portfolio, come on over! No internet in the apartment, but if it’s needed, we can go to the clubhouse. Stay as long as you’d like. Bring a swim suit to go […]
item.content:encoded:
Date and Time: June 15th at 11 am

Location: Private Home in Durham; address sent to those registered

If you want to work on your portfolio, come on over! No internet in the apartment, but if it’s needed, we can go to the clubhouse. Stay as long as you’d like. Bring a swim suit to go swimming after (or during if you need a break).

What to bring:
*Resumes, info for resumes -addresses/dates/phone numbers/etc.
*letters of recommendation
*certificates for any educational classes you’ve taken/NNTD/conferences/etc.
*photos?
*cards and or letters you’ve received from nanny families (ie Christmas card with warm loving messages?)
*anything else you’d like to include

Register and RSVP on Facebook or by contacting the Volunteer Host.

item.title: (triangle) Hair Donation Party
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: When: June 22nd @ 12 noon Where: Private Home of Hostess in Durham, NC NC PAN secretary Caroline H and NC PAN Treasurer Jennifer L have been growing their hair out to donate to charity. Come and party with them as they get their locks chopped off for charity, and maybe donate some hair of […]
item.content:encoded:
When: June 22nd @ 12 noon

Where: Private Home of Hostess in Durham, NC

NC PAN secretary Caroline H and NC PAN Treasurer Jennifer L have been growing their hair out to donate to charity. Come and party with them as they get their locks chopped off for charity, and maybe donate some hair of your own, too?!

Bring a snack, snips (hair scissors), or strands!

RSVP on Facebook or by messaging secretary Caroline!

item.title: (triangle) Nannies Night Out for April
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Date and Time: April 6th at 6 pm Location: Italian Pizzeria – Guess Rd @ 3823 Guess Rd, Durham, North Carolina 27705 Join us at Italian Pizzeria on Saturday, April 6th at 6pm for dinner, games, giveaways, and FREE DESSERT! Please RSVP by Friday, March 29th so we can make reservations. NO ‘MAYBE’ RSVP’s PLEASE!!! As usual, […]
item.content:encoded:
Date and Time: April 6th at 6 pm

Location: Italian Pizzeria – Guess Rd @ 3823 Guess Rd, Durham, North Carolina 27705

Join us at Italian Pizzeria on Saturday, April 6th at 6pm for dinner, games, giveaways, and FREE DESSERT! Please RSVP by Friday, March 29th so we can make reservations.
NO ‘MAYBE’ RSVP’s PLEASE!!!

As usual, everyone will need to arrive by 6:10 to be seated together, sorry for any inconvenience!

2 strike rule – anyone who RSVPs ‘Yes’ and doesn’t show up will not be included in events for 6 months. If you RSVP ‘Yes” and something comes up for you between the RSVP deadline and the reservation time, please PM Sammi ASAP. Any changes less than 24 hours in advance will be considered a no show and go towards the strike rule.
Emergencies happen, communication is key!

Register and RSVP on Facebook, or by emailing Triangle Nanny Tribe Administrator Sammi.

item.content:encoded:
Date and Time: February 22nd at 7 pm

Location: P.F. Chang’s @ 4325 Glenwood Ave., #2089, Raleigh, North Carolina 27612

Join us at P.F. Chang’s on Friday, February 22nd at 7pm for dinner, games, giveaways, and FREE DESSERT! Please RSVP by Friday, February 15th so we can make reservations.
NO ‘MAYBE’ RSVP’s PLEASE!!!

As usual, everyone will need to arrive by 7:10 to be seated together, sorry for any inconvenience!

NEW RULE: We are implementing a 2 strike rule – anyone who RSVPs ‘Yes’ and doesn’t show up will not be included in events for 6 months. If you RSVP ‘Yes” and something comes up for you between the RSVP deadline and the reservation time, please PM Sammi ASAP. Any changes less than 24 hours in advance will be considered a no show and go towards the strike rule.
Emergencies happen, communication is key!

Register and RSVP on Facebook, or by emailing Triangle Nanny Tribe Administrator Sammi.
